name: Goblings
description:
You are the leader of the Goblings! They all listen to you for guidance on what their jobs are, otherwise they will wander aimlessly and may get themselves into trouble! 

Move around with WASD (or the Arrow Keys) and use, 0-4 to choose a job and space to assign it to the selected Gobling. Build all the houses to complete the level! 

Inspired by Lemmings, resource management games and the Commodore 64
